channel.title: SoftLayer_Virtual_Disk_Image on SoftLayer API
channel.description: Recent content in SoftLayer_Virtual_Disk_Image on SoftLayer API

item.title: SoftLayer_Virtual_Disk_Image
item.description: SoftLayer_Virtual_Disk_Image Service Datatype Description The virtual disk image data type presents the structure in which a virtual disk image will be presented. Virtual block devices are assigned to disk images. Local capacity A disk image's size measured in gigabytes. Type: integer checksum A disk image's unique md5 checksum. Type: string createDate The date a disk image was created. Type: dateTime
